com.magnet.ctxprop.geoloc

Interface MobileClientGeoLocationContextListener


  • @Contract
public interface MobileClientGeoLocationContextListener
    Clients can implement a Singleton service of this type to start receiving notifications of client's whereabouts.

    Be aware that the listener is called synchronously as part of the server chain, so caution should be exercised when performing potentially lengthy operations. Callers should consider sending long operations to another thread.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCurrentUserGeoLocationEvent(com.magnet.ctxprop.geoloc.GeoLocation geoLocation, long systemTime, com.magnet.ctxprop.geoloc.GeoLocation asyncGeoLocation)
      Sent by the default implementation of MobileClientGeoLocationServices when the user location event is propagated to the server.

    • Method Detail

      • onCurrentUserGeoLocationEvent

        void onCurrentUserGeoLocationEvent(com.magnet.ctxprop.geoloc.GeoLocation geoLocation,
                                 long systemTime,
                                 com.magnet.ctxprop.geoloc.GeoLocation asyncGeoLocation)
        Sent by the default implementation of MobileClientGeoLocationServices when the user location event is propagated to the server.
        Parameters:
        geoLocation - the geo location of the user (non-null) at present
        systemTime - the system time in millis for when the event arrived on the server
        asyncGeoLocation - the geo location of the user at the time the user submitted the operation
